Jules Simplicio is a designer of software products. Born and raised in São Paulo, immigrated to Chicago. Currently designing apps at dscout for the field of qualitative and contextual research.

Previously: Designed e-commerce experiences at Threadless for their new on-demand print service, Artist Shops. Designed print collaterals and web articles for Basecamp.

On the side: Currently mentoring designers from Designation.

Shoot me an email.

Threadless Artist Shops managing products

Threadless recently released Artist Shops, a platform for artists to sell their designs printed on a variety of different products, including apparel and wall art. The service provides shop owners with their own customizable e-commerce site, while handling the transactions, printing services, delivery, and customer support. The Manage Products section...
